rules_and_dts.name: HD-ALARM
rules_and_dts.html:
if
   the motive of 'the last interaction' is UnsatisfiedWithDelay
   and the number of days between the creation date of 'the claim' and the date of 'the last interaction' is at least 2
then
   forward to ClaimsExpert as "Prioritization Alarm" with explanation "HD-ALARM" ;

documentation.content:
### Handling delays in answering to customer - prioritization alarm (HD-ALARM)
Forward the complaint to a claims expert with a prioritization alarm when the customers are in the following situation:
- They said they are not satisfied with delay taken to process their claim
- At least two days have passed since they declared the damage

rules_and_dts.name: AC-DEFAULT
rules_and_dts.html:
if
   the motive of 'the last interaction' is UnsatisfiedWithAppliedCoverages
then
   resend to ClaimsExpert with explanation "AC-DEFAULT" ;

documentation.content:
### Reassign to claims expert (AC-DEFAULT)
Forward the complaint to a claims expert with a prioritization alarm when customers are in the following situation:
- They recently said they are not satisfied with the applied coverage

rules_and_dts.name: AC-AUTO-SUBV-DISC - Discount on substitution vehicle
rules_and_dts.fully_qualified_name: Complaint Handling.Applied coverages.Targeted.Auto.AC-AUTO-SUBV-DISC - Discount on substitution vehicle
rules_and_dts.html:
definitions
   set 'the profitability threshold' to 50 ;
   set 'extraDiscountForProfit' to ( the CLTV percentile of 'the client' - 'the profitability threshold' ) / 2 ;
   set 'extraDiscountForChurner' to (when the last interaction of 'the complaint' shows intention to leave : 10 otherwise 0 ) ;
if
   the type of 'the policy' is Auto
   and the motive of 'the last interaction' is UnsatisfiedWithAppliedCoverages
   and there is no option in the options of 'the policy'
      where this option is SubstitutionVehicle ,
   and the CLTV percentile of 'the client' is at least 'the profitability threshold'
then
   discount "SubstitutionVehicle" by 10 + extraDiscountForProfit + extraDiscountForChurner % with explanation "AC-AUTO-SUBV-DISC" ;

documentation.content:
### Discount on loaner vehicle (AC-AUTO-SUBV-DISC)
A discount on a loaner vehicle should be granted to customers in the following situation:
- They stated they are not satisfied with the applied coverages
- Their policy does not include the “loaner vehicle” clause
- They are a very profitable customer, i.e. their CLTV percentile is at least 50%.

The amount of the proposed discount is calculated as:
`10% + extraDiscountForCLTV + extraDiscountForChurner`
where
- `extraDiscountForCLTV = (the CLTV percentile of the client - the profitability threshold) / 2`
- `extraDiscountForChurner = 10% if the customer shows intention to leave otherwise 0%`

rules_and_dts.name: AC-AUTO-SUBV-UP - Upgrade policy with substitution vehicle
rules_and_dts.fully_qualified_name: Complaint Handling.Applied coverages.Targeted.Auto.AC-AUTO-SUBV-UP - Upgrade policy with substitution vehicle
rules_and_dts.html:
if
   the type of 'the policy' is Auto
   and the motive of 'the last interaction' is UnsatisfiedWithAppliedCoverages
   and there is no option in the options of 'the policy'
      where this option is SubstitutionVehicle ,
   and the propensity to upgrade policy of 'the client' is at least 0.4
then
   append upsell proposal "upgrade of the policy to include substitution vehicle" with explanation "AC-AUTO-SUBV-UP" ;

documentation.content:
### Propose policy upgrade to include loaner vehicle (AC-AUTO-SUBV-UP)
An upgrade of the policy to include a loaner vehicle clause should be proposed to customers in the following situation:
- They stated they are not satisfied with the applied coverages
- Their policy does not include the “loaner vehicle” clause
- Their propensity to upgrade their policy is at least 0.4

rules_and_dts.name: AC-AUTO-TPL - 3rd party policy and responsible for damage
rules_and_dts.fully_qualified_name: Complaint Handling.Applied coverages.Targeted.Auto.AC-AUTO-TPL - 3rd party policy and responsible for damage
rules_and_dts.html:
Intention to leaveCLTV percentileCommunicate with clientReassign to
message explanation department explanation
1false< 55AcknowledgmentOfReceiptAC-AUTO-TPL-1
 
 
2≥ 55ProposalAC-AUTO-TPL-2SpecializedClientRepresentativeAC-AUTO-TPL-2
3true< 40AcknowledgmentOfReceiptAC-AUTO-TPL-3
 
 
4[4052[ProposalAC-AUTO-TPL-4
 
 
5≥ 52ProposalAC-AUTO-TPL-5SpecializedClientRepresentativeAC-AUTO-TPL-5

documentation.content:
### Customer responsible for damage rule (AC-AUTO-TPL)
In case of a complaint of a customer with a third-party auto policy that is responsible for the damage, the complaint should be handled as indicated by the following table:

| Intention to leave | CLTV percentile | Communicate with client         | Explanation   | Reassign to                      | Explanation   |
|--------------------|-----------------|---------------------------------|---------------|----------------------------------|---------------|
| No                 | < 55            | AcknowledgmentOfReceipt        | AC-AUTO-TPL-1 | -                                | -             |
| No                 | ≥ 55            | Proposal                        | AC-AUTO-TPL-2 | SpecializedClientRepresentative | AC-AUTO-TPL-2 |
| Yes                | < 40            | AcknowledgmentOfReceipt        | AC-AUTO-TPL-3 | -                                | -             |
| Yes                | [40, 52)        | Proposal                        | AC-AUTO-TPL-4 | -                                | -             |
| Yes                | ≥ 52            | Proposal                        | AC-AUTO-TPL-5 | SpecializedClientRepresentative | AC-AUTO-TPL-5 |

rules_and_dts.name: AC-HOME-CONT-LONGTIME
rules_and_dts.html:
if
   the subtype of 'the policy' is HomeBuildingsOnly
   and the motive of 'the last interaction' is UnsatisfiedWithAppliedCoverages
   and the number of days between the activation date of 'the policy' and the creation date of 'the claim' is at least 180
   and the CLTV percentile of 'the client' is at least 65
then
   forward to SpecializedClientRepresentative as "Client unsatisfied with applied coverages and policy activated a while back - look for ways to improve client satisfaction" with explanation "AC-HOME-CONT-LONGTIME" ;

rules_and_dts.name: AC-HOME-CONT-SMALL-VOUCHER
rules_and_dts.html:
if
   the subtype of 'the policy' is HomeBuildingsOnly
   and the motive of 'the last interaction' is UnsatisfiedWithAppliedCoverages
   and the CLTV percentile of 'the client' is at least 50 and less than 60
then
   append voucher of value 100 € with description "Voucher to spend with affiliate provider" and explanation code "AC-HOME-CONT-SMALL-VOUCHER" ;

then
   append upsell proposal "upgrade of the policy to include contents coverage" with explanation "AC-HOME-CONT-UP" ;

rules_and_dts.name: AC-HOME-CONT-VOUCHER - Propose voucher for extra service with affiliate provider
rules_and_dts.fully_qualified_name: Complaint Handling.Applied coverages.Targeted.Home.AC-HOME-CONT-VOUCHER - Propose voucher for extra service with affiliate provider
rules_and_dts.html:
if
   the subtype of 'the policy' is HomeBuildingsOnly
   and the motive of 'the last interaction' is UnsatisfiedWithAppliedCoverages
   and the number of days between the activation date of 'the policy' and the creation date of 'the claim' is at least 180
   and the CLTV percentile of 'the client' is at least 60
then
   append voucher of value 200 € with description "Voucher to spend with affiliate provider" and explanation code "AC-HOME-CONT-VOUCHER" ;

documentation.content:
### Voucher rule (AC-HOME-CONT-VOUCHER)
A voucher should be offered to customers in the following situation:
- Their policy covers only home structures, not the content ;
- The reason of their interaction is that they are not satisfied with the applied coverages;
- The customer policy has been active for at least 180 days
- Their CLTV percentile is at least 60.

The market value of the voucher should be up to 200€ and can be used with one of our affiliate providers.

rules_and_dts.name: HD-CCOM
rules_and_dts.html:
Delta vs target durationSend client communicationReassign to
min max message explanation recipient explanation
1≥ 10ApologyOnlyHD-CCOM1SpecializedClientRepresentativeHD-CCOM1
229ApologyOnlyHD-CCOM2
 
 
3≤ 1AcknowledgmentOfReceiptHD-CCOM3

documentation.content:
### Handling delays in answering to customer - communication (HD-CCOM)
| Delta vs target duration | Message to client       | Explanation | Reassign to                     |
|--------------------------|-------------------------|-------------|---------------------------------|
| ≥ 10                     | ApologyOnly             | HD-CCOM1    | SpecializedClientRepresentative |
| 2 - 9                    | ApologyOnly             | HD-CCOM2    |                                 |
| 0 - 1                    | AcknowledgmentOfReceipt | HD-CCOM3    |                                 |

rules_and_dts.name: QCS-ALL
rules_and_dts.html:
if
   the motive of 'the last interaction' is UnsatisfiedWithQualityOfCustomerService
then
   forward to QualitySpecialist as "QCS Issue - look for ways to improve overall quality" with explanation "QCS-ALL" ;

documentation.content:
### Forward to quality specialist (QCS-ALL)
Forward to a quality specialist as "QoS Issue - look for ways to improve overall quality" for customers in the following situation:
- They said they are not satisfied with the quality of customer service

rules_and_dts.name: QCS-HIGH-CLTV
rules_and_dts.html:
if
   the motive of 'the last interaction' is UnsatisfiedWithQualityOfCustomerService
   and the CLTV percentile of 'the client' is at least 40
then
   forward to SpecializedClientRepresentative as "QCS Issue - look for ways to improve client satisfaction" with explanation "QCS-HIGH-CLTV" ;

documentation.content:
### Reassign to specialized client rep (QCS-HIGH-CLTV)
Forward the complaint to a specialized client representative as "QoS Issue - look for ways to improve client satisfaction" for customers in the following situation:
- They said they are not satisfied with the quality of customer service
- their CLTV percentile of 'the client' is at least 40

rules_and_dts.name: RA-DEFAULT
rules_and_dts.html:
if
   the motive of 'the last interaction' is UnsatisfiedWithReimbursedAmount
then
   resend to ClaimsExpert with explanation "RA-DEFAULT" ;

rules_and_dts.name: RA-DED-UP - Upgrade policy with no deductible
rules_and_dts.fully_qualified_name: Complaint Handling.Reimbursed amount.Targeted.RA-DED-UP - Upgrade policy with no deductible
rules_and_dts.html:
definitions
   set 'the settlement offer' to a claim settlement offer from the settlement offer of 'the claim' ;
if
   the motive of 'the last interaction' is UnsatisfiedWithReimbursedAmount
   and the CLTV percentile of 'the client' is at least 50
   and the propensity to upgrade policy of 'the client' is at least 0.4
   and the deductible total of 'the settlement offer' is at least 120
   and there is no option in the options of 'the policy'
      where this option is NoDeductible ,
then
   add task sequence ( Reassign to ClaimsExpert but tell client to call back after 8 business days if no news -> Reassign to a SpecializedClientRepresentative suggesting "policy upgrade with no deductible" -> end ) with explanation "RA-DED-UP" ;

documentation.content:
### Handling complaint about reimbursed amount related to high deductible (RA-DED-UP)

In the following situation: a customer with a high CLTV percentile (at least 50) complains about the reimbursed amount and the deductible on his claims is at least 120€ and the propensity to upgrade the policy is at least 0.4

The following actions need to be performed:
- First reassign to a claims expert and tell client to call back after 8 business days if no news (this is to examine the reimbursed amount in more details)
- Once the claims expert has reassessed the claims, reassign the complaint to a SpecializedClientRepresentative suggesting "a policy upgrade to avoid deductibles" ;

documentation.content:
### Handling delays in answering to customer - prioritization alarm (HD-ALARM)
Forward the complaint to a claims expert with a prioritization alarm when the customers are in the following situation:
- They said they are not satisfied with delay taken to process their claim
- At least two days have passed since they declared the damage

documentation.content:
### Handling delays in answering to customer - communication (HD-CCOM)
| Delta vs target duration | Message to client       | Explanation | Reassign to                     |
|--------------------------|-------------------------|-------------|---------------------------------|
| ≥ 10                     | ApologyOnly             | HD-CCOM1    | SpecializedClientRepresentative |
| 2 - 9                    | ApologyOnly             | HD-CCOM2    |                                 |
| 0 - 1                    | AcknowledgmentOfReceipt | HD-CCOM3    |                                 |

rules_and_dts.name: AC-HOME-CONT-LONGTIME
rules_and_dts.html:
if
   the subtype of 'the policy' is HomeBuildingsOnly
   and the motive of 'the last interaction' is UnsatisfiedWithAppliedCoverages
   and the number of days between the activation date of 'the policy' and the creation date of 'the claim' is at least 180
   and the CLTV percentile of 'the client' is at least 65
then
   forward to SpecializedClientRepresentative as "Client unsatisfied with applied coverages and policy activated a while back - look for ways to improve client satisfaction" with explanation "AC-HOME-CONT-LONGTIME" ;

rules_and_dts.name: AC-HOME-CONT-SMALL-VOUCHER
rules_and_dts.html:
if
   the subtype of 'the policy' is HomeBuildingsOnly
   and the motive of 'the last interaction' is UnsatisfiedWithAppliedCoverages
   and the CLTV percentile of 'the client' is at least 50 and less than 60
then
   append voucher of value 100 € with description "Voucher to spend with affiliate provider" and explanation code "AC-HOME-CONT-SMALL-VOUCHER" ;

if

   and the motive of 'the last interaction' is UnsatisfiedWithAppliedCoverages
   and the propensity to upgrade policy of 'the client' is at least 0.4
then
   append upsell proposal "upgrade of the policy to include contents coverage" with explanation "AC-HOME-CONT-UP" ;

rules_and_dts.name: AC-HOME-CONT-VOUCHER - Propose voucher for extra service with affiliate provider
rules_and_dts.fully_qualified_name: Complaint Handling.Applied coverages.Targeted.Home.AC-HOME-CONT-VOUCHER - Propose voucher for extra service with affiliate provider
rules_and_dts.html:
if
   the subtype of 'the policy' is HomeBuildingsOnly
   and the motive of 'the last interaction' is UnsatisfiedWithAppliedCoverages
   and the number of days between the activation date of 'the policy' and the creation date of 'the claim' is at least 180
   and the CLTV percentile of 'the client' is at least 60
then
   append voucher of value 200 € with description "Voucher to spend with affiliate provider" and explanation code "AC-HOME-CONT-VOUCHER" ;

documentation.content:
### Voucher rule (AC-HOME-CONT-VOUCHER)
A voucher should be offered to customers in the following situation:
- Their policy covers only home structures, not the content ;
- The reason of their interaction is that they are not satisfied with the applied coverages;
- The customer policy has been active for at least 180 days
- Their CLTV percentile is at least 60.

The market value of the voucher should be up to 200€ and can be used with one of our affiliate providers.

rules_and_dts.name: QCS-ALL
rules_and_dts.html:
if
   the motive of 'the last interaction' is UnsatisfiedWithQualityOfCustomerService
then
   forward to QualitySpecialist as "QCS Issue - look for ways to improve overall quality" with explanation "QCS-ALL" ;

documentation.content:
### Forward to quality specialist (QCS-ALL)
Forward to a quality specialist as "QoS Issue - look for ways to improve overall quality" for customers in the following situation:
- They said they are not satisfied with the quality of customer service

rules_and_dts.name: QCS-HIGH-CLTV
rules_and_dts.html:
if
   the motive of 'the last interaction' is UnsatisfiedWithQualityOfCustomerService
   and the CLTV percentile of 'the client' is at least 40
then
   forward to SpecializedClientRepresentative as "QCS Issue - look for ways to improve client satisfaction" with explanation "QCS-HIGH-CLTV" ;

documentation.content:
### Reassign to specialized client rep (QCS-HIGH-CLTV)
Forward the complaint to a specialized client representative as "QoS Issue - look for ways to improve client satisfaction" for customers in the following situation:
- They said they are not satisfied with the quality of customer service
- their CLTV percentile of 'the client' is at least 40

rules_and_dts.name: RA-DEFAULT
rules_and_dts.html:
if
   the motive of 'the last interaction' is UnsatisfiedWithReimbursedAmount
then
   resend to ClaimsExpert with explanation "RA-DEFAULT" ;

rules_and_dts.name: RA-DED-UP - Upgrade policy with no deductible
rules_and_dts.fully_qualified_name: Complaint Handling.Reimbursed amount.Targeted.RA-DED-UP - Upgrade policy with no deductible
rules_and_dts.html:
definitions
   set 'the settlement offer' to a claim settlement offer from the settlement offer of 'the claim' ;
if
   the motive of 'the last interaction' is UnsatisfiedWithReimbursedAmount
   and the CLTV percentile of 'the client' is at least 50
   and the propensity to upgrade policy of 'the client' is at least 0.4
   and the deductible total of 'the settlement offer' is at least 120
   and there is no option in the options of 'the policy'
      where this option is NoDeductible ,
then
   add task sequence ( Reassign to ClaimsExpert but tell client to call back after 8 business days if no news -> Reassign to a SpecializedClientRepresentative suggesting "policy upgrade with no deductible" -> end ) with explanation "RA-DED-UP" ;

documentation.content:
### Handling complaint about reimbursed amount related to high deductible (RA-DED-UP)

In the following situation: a customer with a high CLTV percentile (at least 50) complains about the reimbursed amount and the deductible on his claims is at least 120€ and the propensity to upgrade the policy is at least 0.4

The following actions need to be performed:
- First reassign to a claims expert and tell client to call back after 8 business days if no news (this is to examine the reimbursed amount in more details)
- Once the claims expert has reassessed the claims, reassign the complaint to a SpecializedClientRepresentative suggesting "a policy upgrade to avoid deductibles" ;

rules_and_dts.name: AC-AUTO-SUBV-DISC - Discount on substitution vehicle
rules_and_dts.fully_qualified_name: Complaint Handling.Applied coverages.Targeted.Auto.AC-AUTO-SUBV-DISC - Discount on substitution vehicle
rules_and_dts.html:
definitions
   set 'the profitability threshold' to 50 ;
   set 'extraDiscountForProfit' to ( the CLTV percentile of 'the client' - 'the profitability threshold' ) / 2 ;
   set 'extraDiscountForChurner' to (when the last interaction of 'the complaint' shows intention to leave : 10 otherwise 0 ) ;
if
   the type of 'the policy' is Auto
   and the motive of 'the last interaction' is UnsatisfiedWithAppliedCoverages
   and there is no option in the options of 'the policy'
      where this option is SubstitutionVehicle ,
   and the CLTV percentile of 'the client' is at least 'the profitability threshold'
then
   discount "SubstitutionVehicle" by 10 + extraDiscountForProfit + extraDiscountForChurner % with explanation "AC-AUTO-SUBV-DISC" ;

documentation.content:
### Discount on loaner vehicle (AC-AUTO-SUBV-DISC)
A discount on a loaner vehicle should be granted to customers in the following situation:
- They stated they are not satisfied with the applied coverages
- Their policy does not include the “loaner vehicle” clause
- They are a very profitable customer, i.e. their CLTV percentile is at least 50%.

The amount of the proposed discount is calculated as:
`10% + extraDiscountForCLTV + extraDiscountForChurner`
where
- `extraDiscountForCLTV = (the CLTV percentile of the client - the profitability threshold) / 2`
- `extraDiscountForChurner = 10% if the customer shows intention to leave otherwise 0%`

rules_and_dts.name: AC-AUTO-SUBV-UP - Upgrade policy with substitution vehicle
rules_and_dts.fully_qualified_name: Complaint Handling.Applied coverages.Targeted.Auto.AC-AUTO-SUBV-UP - Upgrade policy with substitution vehicle
rules_and_dts.html:
if
   the type of 'the policy' is Auto
   and the motive of 'the last interaction' is UnsatisfiedWithAppliedCoverages
   and there is no option in the options of 'the policy'
      where this option is SubstitutionVehicle ,
   and the propensity to upgrade policy of 'the client' is at least 0.4
then
   append upsell proposal "upgrade of the policy to include substitution vehicle" with explanation "AC-AUTO-SUBV-UP" ;

documentation.content:
### Propose policy upgrade to include loaner vehicle (AC-AUTO-SUBV-UP)
An upgrade of the policy to include a loaner vehicle clause should be proposed to customers in the following situation:
- They stated they are not satisfied with the applied coverages
- Their policy does not include the “loaner vehicle” clause
- Their propensity to upgrade their policy is at least 0.4

rules_and_dts.name: AC-AUTO-TPL - 3rd party policy and responsible for damage
rules_and_dts.fully_qualified_name: Complaint Handling.Applied coverages.Targeted.Auto.AC-AUTO-TPL - 3rd party policy and responsible for damage
rules_and_dts.html:
Intention to leaveCLTV percentileCommunicate with clientReassign to
message explanation department explanation
1false< 55AcknowledgmentOfReceiptAC-AUTO-TPL-1
 
 
2≥ 55ProposalAC-AUTO-TPL-2SpecializedClientRepresentativeAC-AUTO-TPL-2
3true< 40AcknowledgmentOfReceiptAC-AUTO-TPL-3
 
 
4[4052[ProposalAC-AUTO-TPL-4
 
 
5≥ 52ProposalAC-AUTO-TPL-5SpecializedClientRepresentativeAC-AUTO-TPL-5

documentation.content:
### Customer responsible for damage rule (AC-AUTO-TPL)
In case of a complaint of a customer with a third-party auto policy that is responsible for the damage, the complaint should be handled as indicated by the following table:

| Intention to leave | CLTV percentile | Communicate with client         | Explanation   | Reassign to                      | Explanation   |
|--------------------|-----------------|---------------------------------|---------------|----------------------------------|---------------|
| No                 | < 55            | AcknowledgmentOfReceipt        | AC-AUTO-TPL-1 | -                                | -             |
| No                 | ≥ 55            | Proposal                        | AC-AUTO-TPL-2 | SpecializedClientRepresentative | AC-AUTO-TPL-2 |
| Yes                | < 40            | AcknowledgmentOfReceipt        | AC-AUTO-TPL-3 | -                                | -             |
| Yes                | [40, 52)        | Proposal                        | AC-AUTO-TPL-4 | -                                | -             |
| Yes                | ≥ 52            | Proposal                        | AC-AUTO-TPL-5 | SpecializedClientRepresentative | AC-AUTO-TPL-5 |
